pages.text: Apart from their golden wings, the $(thing)Flying Cows$$() of the $(thing$()Aether$() aren't all that different to regular $(thing)Cows$(). Unlike regular cows though, They can be saddled and ridden. The wings allow them to almost fly, leaping high into the air, then gliding slowly down.$(br2)Killing a $(thing)Flying Cow$() grants 1 $(thing)Cutting$() experience. They can be led, and bred using $(item)Blue Berries$().
